content: say rawr to this crochet dino buddy created in bernat maker this friendly dinosaur toy is a perfect introduction to the world of amigurumi learn single_crochet single_crochet 2 together simple assembly and embroidery half_double_crochet and working in continuous rounds with its simple construction and a beginner-friendly yarn you ll be making a whole collection of colorful dinos for all your friends materials bernat® maker™ 8 8 oz/250 g 317 yds/290 m main color mc acid 06015 1 ball or 105 yds/96 m contrast a teal 06005 1 ball or 15 yds/14 m measurement approx 9 23 cm tall
